english.segment2: So many different things I hold in my hand, But I don't hold them there. Gravity holds them down, Gods finger picks them up moves them around.
english.segment3: Some of them I wanted to stay, some were a happy release. Others appeared with joyous surprises others too heavy for grief.
english.segment4: Move it around. Pick it up and move it around.
english.segment5: These things I hold them an offering to God. He sees my hand and then. Raises me seven on my knees. I will trust and obey.
english.segment6: Move it around. Pick it up and move it around.
